titre: Fortnightly Reminder to Do List for Book Readers Repurpose As Bookmark
intro: Here’s a handy reminder for devoted book lovers. Readers often get so absorbed that other important tasks slip their minds. So, I created a pocket note to help keep track of those essential to-dos. This note also has space for jotting down a quick review or key points from the book currently being read.

materiaux:
Supplies
  • Open an Excel file and set the margin to "Narrow."
  • Adjust the column width to 10.33 and the row height to 14.4.
  • Enter the list of months on top so as to make it reusable. Enter the days of the week on the left. MAke it not more than 2 weeks so that the note can complete with the book that is being read.
  • You can start the week on any day you prefer—I've chosen Monday as a personal preference.
  • With these dimensions, you can fit two notes on a single page.
  • Add a to-do on the right. This needs to be filled with tasks that are not scheduled.
  • Add a books section at the bottom to put down points about the book being read.
  • Also add a notes section to write down other things that are not important bit can not be forgotten.
  • Customize it as much as you'd like, then save it as a PDF for easy portability.
  • Double-check to make sure everything fits neatly on one page without spilling over, and adjust as needed.
  • Feel free to reach out to me if you need any help.
  • Print out your reminder and enjoy!
